Articles.Content: This close to release weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re all overcome with nostalgic feelings of the years past, in which weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve seen KSP grow from very humble beginnings to the game it has become now. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been an amazing journey and when we think about all the great videos that were produced by the community during that time the Build, Fly, Dream trailer certainly is one of the best. It still manages to make the hairs on our necks stand up!
This was always one of my favorites too. I would love to see him remake it in 1.0 graphics. Every scene the same, just updated.
I would say that Build, Fly, Dream is one of the best KSP cinematics. The choice of music was very fitting, and gave you that feeling of awe...

Well I'd say that captures the feeling of ksp pretty well! 

Cabin lights for all!

Love this video!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T21:32:29Z" title="04/22/2015 09:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by DerpenWolf**
<- Sheds a tear.
Glad to see this video come up again! Best trailer ever.
This video was the one that convinced me to get KSP nearly 2 years ago. Good choice! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This video really hits home. KSP is like a child I've watched grow up, for almost 2 and a half years, and now, that child is about to move out. This video just shows how long I've been following KSP, and even if it wasn't the full 4 years, I still feel as if I've been here the whole time. Squad, thank you, for creating the best game ever.

Well, it is a beautiful video, but TBH it does not bring that much of nostalgia to me. From what I see in parts this video is from around 0.18 and that in the terms of the current KSP lifetime is about midlife. The Kraken was dead and half buried in Bop, we had planets and reentry effects ...

Now if you want nostalgia from me , well, I can bring the video that pushed me to get ( not buy, since the game was free at that point ) the game ( P.S. It took me a hour to find it back ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ) :

- <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z7qOz0QlV7Y?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

OFC it is modded parts, BTW ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I really liked that one, but for me

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NimK4pFG7eg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 really did it for me. Wish it was longer though.
Great, although I already heard that song in many KSP cinematic videos.

How come I never saw this trailer before?

It's... gorgeous. I LOVE it.

> 
> I really liked that one, but for me 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NimK4pFG7eg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
>  really did it for me. Wish it was longer though.

I liked this one:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zpjh3SSo3dM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Yes. A very enjoyable one.
i say they remake this trailer for 1.0

That cinematic was awesome! But, to be honest, if you *really* want to get nostalgic, why not watch a video that squad themselves made? Back in a time where 1.0 was something of a dream:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/l5OhFnq_iKw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> i say they remake this trailer for 1.0

First thing I thought.
I think they should make this the official 1.0 trailer

They don't necessarily need to remake this trailer for 1.0, but they could take a lot of hints from it... not stealing at all ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

But really, SQUAD, please tell us that something like this is planned. The silly trailers are great and I always laugh at them, but this is, after all, *1.0*. Don't make a silly trailer for this one. We trust you guys! You have the skills! You have the technology! *Now don't mess up!* ***OR ELSE-***

ahem- no pressure

Great videos - really enjoyed them all ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

A brief history of KSP...

I remember the introduction of asteroids, science, and career mode

I remember the launch tower limiting the size of my ships

I remember when there were no space planes - but strangely I believe there was always a runway

I remember the time before landing gear - spaceships don't need wheels

I remember the time before docking ports

I remember the game when there were no planets other than Kerbin

I remember when there was no Minmus

I remember when there was no actual Kerbol (sun) - it was a very bright lie!

I remember when Kerbin did not orbit around Kerbol

I remember the game when it was free

I remember when there was no Mun

I remember when there was only SAS and no RCS toggle

I remember when the atmosphere suddenly stopped at 34,500m

I remember when the altimeter topped out at 999,999K

I remember the time before time warp and spending all my real minutes to perform a full orbit

I remember when Kerbin did not rotate at all

I remember falling in love with the game called Kerbal Space Program

Awe inspiring... HD remake would really be something, yeah... Somehow now I feel like I could wait much longer for the update and still be hyped every day.

Epic Soundtrack.

'Nuff said.

Oh good grief yes. The intro scenes still make the hair stand up on my neck too - and the final scene can still put a tear in my eye. That video and

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/a46RX7LTx-4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 one sum up KSP for me.

Always felt it should have been the 1.0 release trailer. Think I said that in the comments a few years ago.

Great stuff.

I only saw the video once, a long time ago, but yes it is totally awesome and inspirational to any and all. That video should be the game trailer. Or a remake in HD with new parts and such but same video. 

Very nice memories.
